parameters: This keeps the AlwaysOn common event running
Set up the player lantern if needed
Halt music and pitch camera up towards enemy
Play sound effect and show gab image and text
Hide minimap, mob, and UI to prep for battle
If player wins, erase the wandering mob
If player runs or loses, keep the mob in-place
Move on to next event page to change trigger type
